definition: room/work unit/grave/scabbard/family or clan/one of the 28 constellations of Chinese astronomy

sentences.english: The shed was formerly connected on its western side to the inner chambers. My mother sometimes would come over here.
sentences.chinese: 房子的西边和内室相连，先母曾经来过一次。

sentences.english: Your wife will be like a fruitful vine in your home.
sentences.chinese: 你妻子在你的内室，好象多结果子的葡萄树。

sentences.english: And there were liers in wait abiding in the chamber.
sentences.chinese: 有人预先埋伏在内室里。

sentences.english: The young girl herself generally passed her time in the chamber at the farther end of her apartments.
sentences.chinese: 那年轻姑娘此时正在她的内室里。

sentences.english: What a field this opens for us in the inner chamber.
sentences.chinese: 神在内室中为我们所开启的是何等的境界。

sentences.english: Your wife will be like a fruitful vine within your house;
sentences.chinese: 你妻子在你的内室，好像多结果子的葡萄树。

sentences.english: The angel went into the other room, brought back the silver hands, and showed them to him.
sentences.chinese: 天使走进内室，拿出那双银手给国王看。

sentences.english: Let the king bring me into his chambers. We rejoice and delight in you;
sentences.chinese: 王带我进了内室，我们必因你欢喜快乐。

sentences.english: Their land brought forth frogs in abundance, in the chambers of their kings.
sentences.chinese: 在他们的地上，以及王宫的内室，青蛙多多滋生。

sentences.english: Cold Sauna Chamber Refinement shampoo is a kind of shampoos of high-effective media quality which are used in the car indoor rooms.
sentences.chinese: 冷桑内室精洗剂是一款高效中性的汽车内室清洗剂。

sentences.english: Cold Sauna Chamber Refinement shampoo is a kind of shampoos of high-effective media quality which are used in the car indoor rooms.
sentences.chinese: 冷桑内室精洗剂是一款高效中性的汽车内室清洗剂。

sentences.english: Let the king bring me into his chambers. (Friends) We rejoice and delight in you ;
sentences.chinese: 王带我进了内室，我们必因你欢喜快乐。

sentences.english: He cautiously checks out the interior of the house, pausing to sift through some mail.
sentences.chinese: 他认真地查看屋子的内室，停下来细查一些信件。
来到你的内室几分宁静。

sentences.english: Now she had men lying in ambush in an inner chamber.
sentences.chinese: 有人预先埋伏在妇人的内室里。

definition: warm room/warm partition of a room
reception pavilion (generally part of a large residence, and often built in a garden)
a room in a Buddhist monastery/a temple
